title: repair your html  sites....
body:
http://prntscr.com/qi8fk6

http://prntscr.com/qi8g24

I can't even show someone how he troll/grief... on map... , seems cool to don't have tool to proof it , that someone troll ,2 months ago and haven't been answering for his behaviour ...

It really looks , like you loss all your performance team there... , attempt to employ someone who check integrity of your system , not just repair/create and fix thinghs which others tell you... , make yourself a team to verify the integrity of your sites , if everything work fine...

replies.body: Yeah, the matchhistory site is pretty broken. The search function to find other profiles doesn't even work anymore; I just get a 500 (server error). I don't think Riot particularly cares. =\
You don't need to "prove" it to anyone on the boards. You can just report them after a game. If you forget to do that, make a support ticket.
